Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan® Synergies plus™ Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels
MicroScan® Synergies plus™ Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Synercid
Regulation Name(s): Fully automated short-term incubation cycle antimicrobial susceptibility system
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive enterococci and staphylococci
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Synercid for automated antimicrobial susceptibility testing of gram-positive enterococci and staphylococci.
Indications for Use Summary: Used to determine quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial agent susceptibility of colonies of Enterococcus faecium (vancomycin- and multidrug-resistant) and Staphylococcus aureus (methicillin-susceptible) using Synercid in automated and visual AST formats.
